entry.title: [GRA4][Dedicated Servers] GRA0404B01A/GRA0404B01B
entry.content:
Nov 23, 23:16 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 23/11/2024 22:02 UTC
End time : 23/11/2024 23:05 UTC
Root cause : It was due to a malfunction on a power supply.
All the servers are operational again.

We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 23, 23:11 UTC
Update - Most of servers in the rack GRA0404B01A are operational again.

Nov 23, 22:51 UTC
Update - A significant number of servers in the rack GRA0404B01A are operational again.

Nov 23, 22:22 UTC
Update - All the servers are operational in the rack GRA0404B01B.

Nov 23, 22:22 UTC
Update - Some servers are getting operational again.

Nov 23, 22:19 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Nov 23, 22:16 UTC
Update - An incident is in progress on our Bare Metal offer. It has temporarily affected the functionality .

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 23/11/2024 22:02 UTC
Service impact : All servers in the racks GRA0404B01A/GRA0404B01B are no longer responding.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

Our teams are fully mobilized and actively working to resolve this problem.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Nov 23, 22:13 UTC
